title: Yunikon ni Notte
overview: When Sana was only 23 years old on her sleeve, she co-founded the startup Dream Pony. The main product of the company was an educational application, and Sana dreamed that her application would become popular all over the world. Now the girl is already 26, and her startup has been around for three years. At first, things were going very well, but now the company is in stagnation. Because of this, the sleeves are constantly worried. In addition, she was trapped in unrequited love because of her feelings for Suzuki Ko, the co-founder of Dream Pony, who knows nothing about the feelings of his colleague.One day, a middle-aged man who is Satoshi gets a job at Dream Pony. Before that, who worked in a traditional Japanese company, and it's hard for him to get used to the "modern" way of doing business. And on the sleeves, in whose subordination the man turned out to be, I am not happy with such cooperation. However, it soon became clear that Kotori could share his knowledge based on wisdom and experience.
